item.title: Dr. Dwijendra Nath Bhakat
item.description: Dr. Dwijendra Nath Bhakat (born 2 February 1954) is a writer, poet and literary critic of Assamese, Rajbangshi and Bengali language. His literary work has been mostly in two fields: 1) Vaishnavite literature and culture and 2) Rajbangshi language, literature and culture. He worked in Golakganj Chilarai College of Western Assam for more than three decades as Associate Professor of Assamese Language. He has also worked as a Research Guide of MIL (Modern Indian Language) department of Gauhati University.
